metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3524 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in Linux Kernel. It has been declared asproblematic. Affected by this vulnerability is the functionipv6_renew_options of the component IPv6 Handler. The manipulation leads tomemory leak. The attack can be launched remotely. It is recommended toapply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier VDB-211021 was assigned tothis vulnerability.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
